snippet.title: Sigma Theory: Global Cold War - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/716640

From the creators of the award-winning sci-fi game Out There comes Sigma Theory: Global Cold War, Mi-Clos Studio’s new futuristic turn-based cold war spy simulation game. 

After a paradigm-shifting scientific discovery, the titular Sigma Theory, the player is invited to build their own intelligence agency and delve deep into a shadowy world of subterfuge and back-stabbing diplomacy. Heavily influenced by the creators’ real-life experience in the intelligence industry, players will recruit, bribe, and assassinate to ensure their chosen nation will lead the planet towards a radical new future. 

Sigma Theory is set to release on April 18th, 2019 for PC, Linux and Mac (Steam). 

Trailer Credits
Gilles Pointeau: Motion Design
Siddhartha Barnhoorn: Music
